channel.title: Webclient HELP
channel.description:
I am using Hostgator.com as my website maker peoples. I put my client.jar on and a default.html file on there that has this in it: [code=html4strict]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>ShadeScape WebClient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="ShadeScape" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>[/code]
The website is www.ragester.com/default.html
I don't know how to fix this it loads the java and then it goes to the Host Gator error page! HELP PLEASE

item.title: Webclient HELP
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

I’ve had that sort of problem before.
It is possible that your client is trying to open a webpage on your server that doesn’t exist.
Like: www.ragester.com/java_error.ws

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient HELP
item.dc:creator: @Luponic Luponic
item.description:
@Luponic wrote:

I didn’t make it and I realized that after I posted it but forgot to edit it… and I got it from a tut. Idk why it doesn’t work but can someone please help???

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

has a spelling error other then that your script looks like an fail.
